item.title: OpenVPN on (Rooted) SGS2
item.description: Since mid-last year, I started using a VPN service. Good for me, my VPN provider has both L2TP and OpenVPN services. L2TP is very easy to configure on Android phones (newer ones). But I find it unstable (may be my provider's problem). So, I prefer OpenVPN as its stable.
